text: I when we reached our %SC% destination, we found nothing standing on the ground except some rocks scattered here and there Nobody would be able to recognize it as part of the city wall a thousand years ago 2. Today, most people have got a new perspective. They no longer accept the view that mainly GDP marks the happiness of a nation. 3. Let's %SC% to disagree. We at least agree on one thing. We agree not to use force. We agree that we must settle our disputes peacefully %SC%
